channel.title: What would you like to see announced at E3 2011?
channel.description:
Yeah the title pretty much explains it, I personally would love to hear what Valve has to say at E3 this year. It's a long shot, but I'm definitely hoping for an announcement on Episode 3/ Half life 3(unlikely). Any other time if someone said that to me I would tell them to keep dreaming, but with the release or portal 2 came a few subtle hints regarding Episode 3.
[url]https://www.g4tv.com/thefeed/blog/post/711926/half-life-2-episode-3-clues-revealed-in-portal-arg-puzzle/[/url]

item.title: What would you like to see announced at E3 2011?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
k3nny1550:

Didn’t SOF die with “Payback?” Of course, this is because it wasn’t Raven doing the legwork.

Yeah, it was some team of incompetent fuckwads. Doesn’t help it was a budget title as well.

Such a shame.

item.title: What would you like to see announced at E3 2011?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Maxey:

Soldier of Fortune reboot/remake
Respawn Entertainment’s first game
Quake 5/Doom 4

Didn’t SOF die with “Payback?” Of course, this is because it wasn’t Raven doing the legwork.

And yes, I’d like to see what Respawn can come up with. Maybe that sci-fi idea they were kicking around Activision before the MW2 bonuses clusterfuck.

Read full topic

item.title: What would you like to see announced at E3 2011?
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
DiePoente:

Thanks, Commander Retard, ehm Dotard. So, when Valve always says that they aren’t going to do something, they are going to do something, so we can complain if they aren’t going to do anything. That’s awesome. We can bitch about things that have never been announced, just to annoy Valve! Yay!

Hope you now feel better fucking german dude

Read full topic

item.title: What would you like to see announced at E3 2011?
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
Dotard:

Valve said, Valve said …
Someone said that end of the world was supposed to happen in may 2011 and we are still alive …
They are just trolling us … Gabe will pop up at E3 with new HL you guys will see!

Thanks, Commander Retard, ehm Dotard. So, when Valve always says that they aren’t going to do something, they are going to do something, so we can complain if they aren’t going to do anything. That’s awesome. We can bitch about things that have never been announced, just to annoy Valve! Yay!

Sniper_Rofl:

XD

I hate this emoticon so much…

Read full topic

A lot of them? Are you serious? :hmph:

item.title: What would you like to see announced at E3 2011?
item.dc:creator: Nerdguy
item.description:
I’ll hope for something unexpected (games that are still pretty much rumor) such as:
-Company of heroes 2?
-The new splinter cell game? (it think ubi is still working on ghost recon tho)
-Halo?
-HL2:Episode 3?
-Command & Conquer?
-Star wars battlefront 3?
-Half Life 3?
-GTA5?

And probably something expected:
-Battlefield 3
-Modern Warfare 3
-AC: Revelations

The rest is just hope…

Read full topic

item.title: What would you like to see announced at E3 2011?
item.dc:creator: Vitriol
item.description:
What would I like to see announced?
EA and Activision go belly up, Valve buys IP’s.

Honestly;
HomeWorld 3
MechWarrior 3015
STALKER 2
Half Life 3

In that order.

item.source: What would you like to see announced at E3 2011?

item.title: What would you like to see announced at E3 2011?
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Dotard:

Valve said, Valve said …
Someone said that end of the world was supposed to happen in may 2011 and we are still alive …
They are just trolling us … Gabe will pop up at E3 with new HL you guys will see!

Once again with the idiotic optimism. If they say they’re not going to do something very specific in the near future, then they’re not going to do it.

Anyway, there’s nearly a 0% chance but god dammit I want to see Star Wars Battlefront III.

Read full topic

item.title: What would you like to see announced at E3 2011?
item.dc:creator: TheRatMan
item.description:
“I welcome to the stage, Zapp Brannigan!”
“As you know, the key to victory is the element of surprise. Surprise!”
Fade to Black
Half Life 3

This. So fucking much! if something like this would happen in E3 the crowd will go berserk

item.title: What would you like to see announced at E3 2011?
item.dc:creator: DEATH_eVADER
item.description:
Khaos124:

im pretty sure valve said they wouldnt be announcing anything at e3 this year…

I would laugh so hard if the statement sent out to everybody was a red herring, given how underwhelming their ‘surprise’ last year left many people sore. This year it would be a ‘SURPRISE’

“I welcome to the stage, Zapp Brannigan!”
“As you know, the key to victory is the element of surprise. Surprise!”
Fade to Black
Half Life 3

Read full topic
